sentences.en: A fusion factor exists separate from the virus'ability to hemolyze.
sentences.cn: 融合因素未必能与病毒溶血能力分开.

sentences.en: After this aggregation, paramyxoviruses effect fusion of the agglutinated cells.
sentences.cn: 在这种聚合之后, 副粘液病毒能使凝集的细胞发生融合.

sentences.en: Brass is formed by the fusion of copper and zinc.
sentences.cn: 黄铜是通过铜和锌的熔合而成的.

sentences.en: For the uninitiated, Western Swing is a fusion of jazz, rhythm & blues, rock & roll and country music.
sentences.cn: 对于外行人来说，西部摇摆是爵士乐、节奏布鲁斯、摇滚乐和乡村音乐的融合。

sentences.en: Her work is a fusion of several different styles.
sentences.cn: 她的作品是几种不同风格的融合。

sentences.en: His previous fusions of jazz, pop and African melodies have proved highly successful.
sentences.cn: 他先前对爵士乐、流行乐和非洲音乐旋律的融合已经证明是非常成功的。

sentences.en: His work is a fusion of several different styles of music.
sentences.cn: 他的作品是几种不同音乐风格的融合.

sentences.en: Next generation Fusion inhibitors like T - 20 may soon fight HIV.
sentences.cn: 下一代融合抑制物 T -20可以迅速攻击艾滋病病毒.

sentences.en: Presumably poliovirus was incorporated into the resistant cells during the fusion process.
sentences.cn: 据推测,脊髓灰质炎病毒是在融合过程中渗入到耐受细胞内的.

sentences.en: Secretory granules are apparently built up from fusion of smaller vesicles.
sentences.cn: 分泌颗粒显然是从较小的小泡融合而成的.

sentences.en: She was a fusion of the dreamer and doer.
sentences.cn: 她是空想者和实干者的结合.

sentences.en: the best fusion cuisine in the whole of Vancouver
sentences.cn: 全温哥华最好的混合料理

sentences.en: The fusion of copper and zinc makes the metal brass.
sentences.cn: 铜和锌的熔化制成黄铜.

sentences.en: the fusion of copper and zinc to produce brass
The use of conventional magnets for commercial fusion reactors is ruled out.
sentences.cn: 商业聚变反应堆上使用常规磁体已不予考虑.

sentences.en: There is no way to harness the energy of fusion.
There was much con fusion and scrambling about in the rooms.
sentences.cn: 每间屋子里都起了骚动.

sentences.en: This alloy is formed by the fusion of two types of metal.
sentences.cn: 这种合金是用两种金属熔合而成的.

words.tran_cn: [物] 熔化的，[化学] 熔凝的；装有保险丝的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 冷聚变；[物理]低温核融合
无国界的融合菜肴；世界料理
融合蛋白；融合蛋白标记物
未焊透，不完全焊透；未完全熔合
未熔合；未焊透；熔解不足
n. 核聚变；[物]核子融合
脊柱融合术；脊柱制动术
热核融合；热核熔合；热核反应；热核聚变

trans.tran_cn: 融合，熔解，熔化，融合物，[物]核聚变
trans.tran_en: A fusion of different qualities, ideas, or things is something new that is created by joining them together
